page.title: 05VILLAGE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {Industry and Employment, Pembury.} There is not much industry in the village today, it is primarily a commuter village. There are two garages in the area, a few shops, offices, and a builders merchants in the High Street. A large coal merchants in Henwood Green Road supplies the whole of Kent. Pembury Hospital, which lies outside the area is the main employer. The remainder of the area is agricultural, with seven farms. The majority of the land is down to pasture. Pembury lies near to the mainline stations of Tonbridge and Tunbridge Wells. London can be reached in 50 minutes to 1 hour 10 minutes. Many work in London or Tunbridge Wells.
